functions.name: capture
functions.description:
Capture a screenshot of the current page. This works in both acceptance tests as well as in integration tests.

import capture from 'ember-visual-test/test-support/helpers';

await capture(assert, 'unique-name');

params.name: assert
params.description: The assert function. This assumes you are using qunit.

params.name: fileName
params.description: A unique string to identify this capture. This will be the file name of the generated images, and has to be unique across your whole application. If it contains '/', subdirectories will be created so you can group baseline images.

params.name: options
params.description: An optional object with options. The following options are allowed:

params.name: options.selector
params.description: An optional selector to screenshot. If not specified, the whole page will be captured.

params.name: options.fullPage
params.description: If a full page screenshot should be made, or just the browsers viewport. Defaults to `true`

params.name: options.delayMs
params.description: Delay (in milliseconds) before taking the screenshot. Useful when you need to wait for CSS transitions, etc. Defaults to `100`.
